Edvin Endre

blog.name: moomins-eyes
blog.title: Forget-me-nots and Lavenders
blog.description:
Don't mind me, just doodling these soft beans!
Civi | Nb| they/them | Art blog for Moominvalley

summary:
“Hello, stranger,
Can you tell us where you've been?
More importantly,
However, did you come to be here?
Though a stranger,
You...
body:
Green Valley (½)

“Hello, stranger,
Can you tell us where you’ve been?
More importantly,
However, did you come to be here?
Though a stranger,
You can rest here for a while.
But save your energy,
Your journey here is far from over.
Come the sunrise,
We’ll descend through Judgment Valley
And weigh your worth
Before her majesty, the Verde River”

Based on this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Re0cgRpBaX4

summary: i’ve been using the moomins to battle my summertime depression and have been riding the youtube struggle bus trying to watch...
body:
i’ve been using the moomins to battle my summertime depression and have been riding the youtube struggle bus trying to watch episodes in english but then i found this site that not only has most of the episodes, but lets you download directly from the video. https://www.wco.tv/anime/moomin 


gay rights!!!
